pages.text: Used alongside a Gavv Rider's transformation device to transform into that Rider$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/bitter_gavv)Kamen Rider Bitter Gavv$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/jeeb_stomach)Jeeb Stomach$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/shiita_stomach)Shiita Stomach$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/nyelv_stomach)Nyelv Stomach$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/glotta_stomach)Glotta Stomach$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:gavv/mobs/lango_stomach)Lango Stomach$(/l)'s equipment
